notes: G7 validates that the Immersive Scrolling Auditor has tested scroll-lock behavior, animation performance (60fps target), mobile Safari compatibility, and real device testing. The certification score (≥8.0/10 to pass) and any Tier 1 failures are recorded in the report. No Tier 1 failures are allowed.
